contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "only the Spirit of God knows the deep things of God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: no one knows the deep things of God except the Spirit of God

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Some people might think that if we do not eat some things, God will love us less. But they are wrong. Those who think that God will love us more if we do eat those things are also wrong" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: We are not worse if we do not eat, nor better if we do eat it

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated as a positive. Alternate translation: "The temptations that affect you are temptations that all people experience" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to all humanity

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated positively. Alternate translation: "the woman depends on the man, and the man depends on the woman" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: the woman is not independent from the man, nor is the man independent from the woman

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated as a positive. Alternate translation: "I want you to know" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: I do not want you to be uninformed

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "It rejoices only in righteousness and truth" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: It does not rejoice in unrighteousness. Instead, it rejoices in the truth

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated as a positive. Alternate translation: "they all have meaning" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])

This can be expressed positively and combined with the other positive statement. Alternate translation: "only for believers" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-parallelism]])
contextId.quote: οὐ τοῖς ... ἀπίστοις ... ἀλλὰ τοῖς πιστεύουσιν
contextId.glQuote: not for unbelievers, but for believers
